entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Naujaat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:55 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -31.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Naujaat 8:00 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023
Temperature: -31.6°C
Pressure: 100.4 kPa
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -38
Dewpoint: -35.2°C
Wind: ESE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 33. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming east 30 km/h near midnight. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 40 this evening and minus 53 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 38 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow early in the morning. Blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 38 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 56. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 40. Wind chill minus 53 in the evening and minus 61 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023
